Package ec.id.capabilities

Interface Summary
FileTransfer Remote file transfer interface.
FileTransferHandler  
Telepathy Interface defining basic Telepathy capability.
TelepathyHandler Handler interface for receiving telepathy.
WhereisCapabilityHandler Interface for handler for whereis information.
Whereis Remote interface defining ability for clients to ask where the owner currently is.
 

Class Summary
FileTransferCapability Capability to send a file.
FileTransferImpl Implementation of FileTransfer remote interface.
RMIFileTransferOutputStream Stream for sending data via a proxy RMI object that implements the FileTransfer interface.
Speech Representation of speech for telepathy.
TelepathyCapability Telepathy capability instance.
WhereisCapability Capability to ask for 'whereis' information.
